mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (userName, password, gender, email, birth, identity, status) values (#{userName}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{identity}, ifnull(#{status},0));
mapper.update: update user_tb set userName = ifnull(#{userName},userName), password = ifnull(#{password},password), gender = ifnull(#{gender},gender), email = ifnull(#{email},email), birth = ifnull(#{birth},birth), identity = ifnull(#{identity},identity), status = ifnull(#{status},status) where id=#{id};
